content: There's no unified docs team anymore, so should we still be adding it to issues such as https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/80862 ?
Seems like it should be changed back to A-doc
The one nice thing about it being T-doc and not A-doc is that it signifies that it's category of the change, not the region in (e.g.) the compiler that's being changed.

Maybe we should just update the description of the T-doc label to say something along the lines of "Something relating to documentation"? I can make the change, but I want to make sure people are on board first :)
